name: 洪祖全
objective: 先修課程：物理或負責教授同意。不可壓縮流體、質量不滅、非黏性流體之運動、柏努力定律、線性及角動量定理及其應用、渦流與勢流、黏性流、納維爾－史脫克斯方程式及應用、管中壓力頭損失及增加、邊界層與分離升力與阻力及雷諾方程式之應用。
schedule:
1.General introduction to the class and the course
2,Introduction to ”fluid mechanics”
3-4.Fluid Statics
5-6.Elementary Fluid Dynamics—The Bernoulli Equation
7.1st midterm exam
8-9.Fluid Kinematics
10-11.Finite Control Volume Analysis
11-12.Differential Analysis of Fluid Flow
13.2nd midterm exam
14.Similitude, Dimensional Analysis, and Modeling
15.Viscous Flow in Pipes
16. Navier-Stoke equation and its special form
17.CFD and its application
18.Final exam
scorePolicy: 2 midterm examinations (25% each); final examination (30%); others (20%); special term project for special credit. Your final points will be completely dependent of what you can show yourself in the examinations and any special performance from you.
materials:
Text book: ” A Brief Introduction to Fluid Mechanics”  4th Edition
By Donald F. Young, Bruce R. Munson, Theodore H. Okiishi, Wade W. Huebsch
